Package adept.kbapi.sql

Contains utility classes required to generate SQL queries to access and modify the KB metadata store.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    QuickJDBC
    Utility class that interacts with the SQL metadata database.
    SqlQueryBuilder
    Utility to build SQL query and update statements

Package adept.kbapi.sql Description

Contains utility classes required to generate SQL queries to access and modify the KB metadata store.
Note that under normal circumstances, the classes under this package are not required to be directly accessed by a user of the ADEPT KB. They are only used internally by the KB API.
